TopicTitle: Crash when disconnecting parts from anchored stack coupler

Articles.Content:
Starting with a TVR-400L quad adapter, flipping it 180 degrees, so the 4 smaller connectors are facing up.

Attaching 4 terrier engines on these connectors and placing a TVR-2160C stack quad coupler on these 4 engines as seen in the picture below:

https://postimg.cc/Z9PfJfCk

Afterwards changing the anchor point to the TVR-2160C and trying to disconnect the terrier engine from it.

This resulted in a crash. No known fixes.

(This was in an attempt to bypass the restrictions while inverting the quad adapter and only having 1 engine attached)

KSP version 0.1.0.0.20892, vanilla

Windows 10 21H2 19044.2604

i5-9600k, rtx2070s

3440x1440 resolution
